metadata.dcterms:title: NIGERIAN LITERATURE IN FRENCH TRANSLATION (NILIFT)
metadata.dcterms:creator: Madueke, Ijeoma Sylvia
metadata.dcterms:description: A comprehensive list of Nigerian texts translated and published in French. Data includes place and year of publication both in English and French as well as names of translators.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Arts and Humanities
Nigerian Literature, Translation, French, Africa
